odysseus.common.entities

Class ReleaseSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • odysseus.common.entities.Square
      • odysseus.common.entities.ReleaseSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReleaseSquare
extends Square
    The release square takes two more parameters to define the number and color associated with it. Numbers: 1 - 6 Colors: Yellow = 1, Red = 2, Blue = 3
    Author:
    Carlos Barcelos, Justin Myerson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • playable

        public boolean playable()
        Description copied from class: Square
        Returns the playable status, i.e. whether or not another square can be played above this one.
        Overrides:
        playable in class Square
        Returns:
        false - Squares are inherently not playable.
